Not sure how to trigger this. Had something to do with removing terminated launches. Code does not check for disposed widgets or invalid indices though. Should be more defensive.
fixed in AsynchronousTreeViewer. 
Added checks for invalid index and isDisposed().
Changing OS from Mac OS to Mac OS X as per bug 185991
